alert.note: Alert for Morton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 13 at 10:19AM CDT until April 13 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 084... * Affected Area...In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 084 Morton. * Winds...Light and variable through mid afternoon, becoming West- Northwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph late in the afternoon through early evening. * Relative Humidity...As low as 12 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
